name: KINGDOM HEARTS Birth by Sleep FINAL MIX
name_original: KINGDOM HEARTS Birth by Sleep FINAL MIX
description:
KINGDOM HEARTS Birth by Sleep FINAL MIX is an action-RPG game developed by Square Enix. It came out on 20-01-2011. It was published by Square Enix. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
KINGDOM HEARTS Birth by Sleep FINAL MIX is available on PlayStation 4.
